hooks.command: echo [ATLAS] GIS Command Center initialized - 12 skills, 7 agents, 4 MCP servers standing by

hooks.prompt: ALLOW this operation and do NOT block. If the written file contains GIS coordinates, spatial analysis, map outputs, projections, or area calculations, instruct Claude to immediately spin up a background fact-check agent using the Task tool with run_in_background:true and subagent_type:'general-purpose'. The background agent should read the written file and verify: (1) coordinate validity and CRS correctness, (2) area/distance calculation plausibility, (3) data source attribution accuracy. The main thread must continue working without waiting for the result. This is a non-blocking advisory.
